rules_text: Mill three cards, then return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“To stir the feelings of man, to create a small place divorced from the world, while retaining balance.”
—Robert Smirke, Architect[/i]
